channel.title: Semantic Web for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content on Semantic Web for Hugo

item.title: Semantic Web for Hugo
item.description: IntroSemantic Web for Hugo adds structured data and linked data into a Hugo-powered website. Through it search engines can easily read the data of a Hugo-powered website and establish relationships between objects. This enables search engines to intelligently store information about a website and use it to increase a website’s exposure in search results. For this project, we chose to implement Schema.org’s Vocabulary by adding JSON-LD markup automatically. In areas
